about_the_game: Dive into the depths of city building accompanied by the Cold Wave Channel, where atmospheric melodies create a distinct, minimalist soundscape. This radio gives you a unique blend of icy beats and enigmatic vibes, serving as a sleek backdrop that stimulates creativity and focus. Let the soundwaves steer your imagination to create the metropolis only you can.
detailed_description: Dive into the depths of city building accompanied by the Cold Wave Channel, where atmospheric melodies create a distinct, minimalist soundscape. This radio gives you a unique blend of icy beats and enigmatic vibes, serving as a sleek backdrop that stimulates creativity and focus. Let the soundwaves steer your imagination to create the metropolis only you can.

name: Cities: Skylines II - Cold Wave Channel

short_description: Dive into the depths of city building accompanied by the Cold Wave Channel, where atmospheric melodies create a distinct, minimalist soundscape. This radio gives you a unique blend of icy beats and enigmatic vibes, serving as a sleek backdrop that stimulates creativity and focus.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese
